alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Niagara; Northern Erie; Ontario; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wyoming, Cattaraugus, Erie, Livingston, south central Niagara, Chautauqua, Allegany, Genesee, southern Monroe and western Ontario Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking clusters of strong thunderstorms across the area this afternoon. These storms are moving slowly to the southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail will be possible with these storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, West Seneca, North Tonawanda, Jamestown, Clarence, Lackawanna, Batavia, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Olean, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Lancaster, Hamburg, Geneseo, East Aurora and Salamanca. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 12. Interstate 90 between exits 45 and 59. Interstate 86 between exits 7 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also possible with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Niagara; Northern Erie; Ontario; Southern Erie; Wyoming
